name: Ghost Dragons
description:
Description

The goal of the game is to move your dragon in a classic "Snake-like" game mode. Your snake length increases every second so the challenge becomes more and more difficult.
If you play alone, you just run vs time. If you play with friends, the last dragon standing is declared winner.
This game can be played up to 8 players locally on your computer. One player may use the keyboard, but it is recommended to use any controller pad you have (tested with XBox, Gamecube and PlayStation-like controllers, it rocks !).

Controls

In order to play, just plug your pad and push any BUTTON (or SPACE) only once to register. When all players have registered, press a second time BUTTON/SPACE and the game starts automatically.
You can pause the game pressing ESCAPE. During pause, you can either press ESCAPE again to kill the game (back to main menu) or press BUTTON/SPACE to resume.
During game you control your dragon with ANALOG STICK (or keyboard LEFT/RIGHT ARROWS).
When the game is finished, a screen appears automatically, showing the maximum snake lengths for all players. Pressing any button or space will make you come back to the start menu.
